services.name: Swedish Massage
services.description: A relaxing full-body massage for stress relief and improved circulation — ideal for regular self-care.

services.name: Deep Tissue Massage
services.description: Therapeutic massage targeting deep muscle knots and chronic tension — great for recovery and intense relief.

services.name: Facial Treatment
services.description: Customized facials for Indian skin types — cleansing, exfoliation and hydration to boost radiance.

services.name: Hot Stone Therapy
services.description: Warm basalt stones and expert techniques to release tension and promote deep relaxation.

services.name: Body Scrub
services.description: Revitalizing body scrub to exfoliate and renew skin — ideal before events and special occasions.

services.name: Aromatherapy
services.description: Personalized essential-oil sessions for relaxation and mood support, blended by our trained therapists.

services.name: Haircut & Hair Styling
services.description: Precision haircuts and styling for men, women & children. Options include quick trims, full restyles, and styling for special occasions (bridal & party looks available).

services.name: Hair Coloring & Highlights
services.description: Full color, highlights and balayage tailored for Indian hair textures — includes consultation and root touch-up options.

services.name: Keratin & Nourishing Treatments
services.description: Intensive smoothing and nourishing treatments (keratin, protein masks) to restore shine and reduce frizz for Indian hair textures.

services.name: Detox & Rejuvenation Therapy
services.description: Restorative full-body packages combining exfoliation and nourishing therapies to refresh and detoxify skin and body.

services.name: Manicure & Pedicure
services.description: Classic and luxury manicure/pedicure services with nail shaping, cuticle care, and polish — including foot therapies and quick express options.

services.name: Luxury Facial & Skincare
services.description: Targeted advanced facials for acne, pigmentation and anti-aging — tailored to Indian skin concerns for visible rejuvenation.

services.name: Relaxation & Pain-Relief Therapy
services.description: Therapeutic sessions focused on pain relief and muscle relaxation, combining tailored techniques for lasting relief.

services.name: Bridal & Party Styling
services.description: Specialist bridal and party styling packages including hair, makeup coordination and on-site styling services for weddings and events.
